text: Mike Wolfs (born 2 September 1970 in Port Credit, Ontario) is a Canadian sailor. He won a silver medal with Ross MacDonald at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the men's Star event. ==References== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Canada Category:Olympic silver medalists for Canada Category:Olympic medalists in sailing Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Pan American Games competitors for Canada Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Canada Category:Sailors at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Mississauga Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in sailing
title: Mike Wolfs
